com.sorcix.sirc

Class ClientState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sorcix.sirc.ClientState

  • public final class ClientState
extends Object
    Contains information about an IrcConnection.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Sorcix

      • getChannel

        protected Channel getChannel(Channel channel)
        Retrieves a shared channel object from the channel map.
        Parameters:
        channel - A channel object representing this channel.
        Returns:
        The channel, or null if this channel doesn't exist. (The local user is not in that channel)
        See Also:
        getChannel(String)

      • getChannel

        protected Channel getChannel(String channel)
        Retrieves a shared channel object from the channel map.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel name.
        Returns:
        The channel, or null if this channel doesn't exist. (The local user is not in that channel)

      • getUser

        protected User getUser(String nick)
        Retrieves a shared user object from the users map.
        Parameters:
        nick - The nickname of this user.
        Returns:
        The shared user object, or null if there is no singleton User object for this user.

      • hasChannel

        protected boolean hasChannel(String name)
        Checks if given channel is in the channel map.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this channel.
        Returns:
        True if the channel is in the list, false otherwise.
